description: A robot technician who spends his time fixing robots, he is Ringo`s guardian and takes care of her. Both he and Ringo seem to have a habit of turning up where Casshern is, whether intentional or not they`re usually witnesses to the end results of Casshern`s actions. It is revealed that Ohji is the one who created Casshern, Dio and Leda, possibly under the orders of Braiking Boss. Their primary function was to be the first robots with the ability to reproduce, however he views them as failures.
name: Ooji
